worker_pools.name: Worker Pool
worker_pools.description: Worker pool pattern with 1 goroutine(s), channels, and WaitGroup
worker_pools.example: File 'character' launches 1 goroutines in worker pool pattern

fan_out.name: Fan-Out
fan_out.description: Fan-out pattern: 8 goroutines consuming from 3 channels
fan_out.example: Multiple consumers reading from shared channels in 'network'

fan_in.name: Fan-In
fan_in.description: Fan-in pattern: 7 goroutines merging into 0 channels
fan_in.example: Multiple producers writing to shared channels in 'ui'
